summary: Successfully tested multi-image upload feature for Contest Winners (up to 5 images) and Hero Images (up to 10 images). All backend API tests passed (13/13). Frontend UI correctly shows multi-image upload interface with ImageUploadWithCrop component, navigation arrows, and dots for image gallery.
passed_tests: POST /api/admin/awards accepts winner_images array with single image
POST /api/admin/awards accepts winner_images array with multiple images (up to 5)
POST /api/admin/awards truncates images to 5 when more provided
Award response contains winner_images field alongside legacy winner_image
Hero images endpoint returns up to 10 images
Hero image CRUD operations work correctly
Full award CRUD flow works with multi-image support
Legacy winner_image field populated from first image for backward compatibility
Admin Panel Contest & Winners tab shows multi-image upload UI (0/5 counter)
Admin Panel Hero Images tab shows 10 image limit in header (0/10)
ImageUploadWithCrop component used for both Contest Winners and Hero Images
Homepage Contest Winners section displays multiple images with navigation
Navigation arrows appear on hover over contest winner images
Navigation dots show image count and allow direct image selection
seed_data_creation: Created and cleaned up test award 'Model of the Week' with winner 'Priya Sharma' and 3 images
context_for_next_testing_agent: Multi-image upload feature fully functional. Contest Winners support up to 5 images with navigation arrows and dots on homepage. Hero Images support up to 10 images. Both use ImageUploadWithCrop component for cropping. Test credentials: admin@bangalorefashionmag.com / Admin@123BFM
features_tested: Contest Winners (Awards) API - POST /api/admin/awards accepts winner_images array (up to 5) - VERIFIED
Contest Winners (Awards) API - GET /api/awards returns winner_images array - VERIFIED
Homepage Contest Winners section displays multiple images with navigation arrows - VERIFIED
Admin Panel Contest & Winners tab shows multi-image upload UI with 5 image limit - VERIFIED
Admin Panel Hero Images tab shows 10 image limit with crop functionality - VERIFIED
